The video was published on Facebook on J: 2019, and had a duration of three minutes and 43 seconds.
The video was accompanied by a caption i: urging viewers to share it widely to close the school and bring the teacher to justice.
Multiple posts on Facebook shared an edi: claiming it took place at a school in Rajbagh, Jammu and Kashmir.
